animal.question: I meow and purr, and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I have soft fur and whiskers.
🐾 I say 'meow'.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail, and love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play in the park.
🔊 I say 'woof'.

animal.question: I quack and swim, and love to eat bread. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live in the water.
🪶 I have feathers and a beak.
🗣️ I say 'quack'.

animal.question: I moo and eat grass, and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I live on a farm.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🗣️ I say 'moo'.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🐘 I am very big and strong.
🥜 I like to eat peanuts and leaves.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears, and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I like to eat carrots and lettuce.
🐇 I have soft fur and a fluffy tail.
🤸 I like to hop around in the garden.

animal.question: I roar and have a mane, and I'm known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very strong animal.
🦁 The male of my species has a big mane.
🗣️ I make a loud roaring sound.

animal.question: I slither and hiss, and I don't have any legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be found in jungles, deserts, or even your backyard.
🐍 Some of my kind can be venomous.
🗣️ I make a hissing sound.

animal.question: I chirp and fly, and build my nest in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🪶 I have feathers and wings.
🐛 I like to eat worms and seeds.
🎶 I make a chirping sound.

animal.question: I am a large mammal that lives in the ocean, known for my black and white pattern, and intelligence. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm a type of toothed whale.
🌊 I'm known for performing tricks at marine parks.
⚫ I am black and white in color.

bug.question: I have six legs and like to buzz. I make honey! What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I like to visit flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.
🐝 I can sting if I feel threatened.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and children think I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I have dots on my back.
🐞 My name has the word 'lady' in it.
🌱 I like to eat aphids on plants.

bug.question: I wiggle and crawl and sometimes I’m long. Birds love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I live in the dirt.
🍎 Robins like to find me after the rain.
🎣 People use me to catch fish.

bug.question: I have colorful wings and drink nectar from flowers. I start as a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am known for my beauty.
🐛 I change a lot during my life.
🌸 I fly around in the daytime.

bug.question: I work hard with my friends and carry things that are much bigger than me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
🥪 I might come to your picnic.
💪 I am very strong for my size.

bug.question: I jump very high and I am green. I eat plants and can be found in fields. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat grass.
🎵 You can sometimes hear me making sounds.
🟢 I am the color of leaves.

bug.question: I can walk on water. I am long and skinny. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I live near ponds and lakes.
⛸️ I use surface tension to stay afloat.
🦟 I sometimes eat other small bugs.

bug.question: I am brown and crunchy. I live in the ground and make a loud noise in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I live near trees.
🎶 Only the males can sing.
☀️ I only come out when it's warm.

bug.question: I build a home from sticks and leaves but I am not a beaver. Some people call me a Caddisfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏞️ I live in streams.
🧱 I use my silk to glue my house together.
🐛 I am a larva.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise and look just like a twig. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I hide in trees.
🍂 My body is long and slender.
🟢 I can be green or brown.
